---
title: "Latest Trades"
author: "Ian Fayorsey"
date: ""
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(doParallel)
library(binancer)
library(magrittr)
library(ggplot2)
library(openxlsx)

data <- foreach(i = 1:1, .combine = rbind, .verbose = T) %do% {
  
  temp <- binance_trades('ETHUSDT')
  
  Sys.sleep(.5)
  
  return(temp)
}

data <- data %>% unique()

data %>% 
  ggplot(aes(id, y= price, colour = is_buyer_maker))+
  geom_point()

Sys.time()



write.xlsx(data, "Market Data", append = T)
```
